movie1.title: Interstellar
movie1.plot: Earth's future has been riddled by disasters, famines, and droughts. There is only one way to ensure mankind's survival: Interstellar travel. A newly discovered wormhole in the far reaches of our solar system allows a team of astronauts to go where no manhas gone before, a planet that may have the right environment to sustain human life.
movie1.Actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Matthew McConaughey, Timothee Chalamet
